title: Vampire Armastus
description: Set in a fictional European town, nowadays, the story is about a vampire who falls in love with a teenager. Both of them are good-looking and hot, and their love story is sudden, beautiful and everlasting. "We are vampires, children and lords of the darkness." (from La Arme Blanche, by Lara Biyuts). Published at Lulu and Smashwords.com.
author: Lara Biyuts
